@赵紫阳: A German Warship Was Scorched By Its Own Missile
The American-made SM-2 air defense missile failed to clear its own silo.

https://www.popularmechanics.com/military/navy-ships/amp21968928/a-german-warship-was-scorched-by-its-own-missile/
标准2导弹差点炸沉自家军舰...嗯这应该是德国人的锅，或者里面一定是中国制造的零件除了问题
